projects.title: TypeScript Floor Plan Generator
projects.description: Built a TypeScript-based floor plan optimizer (Top 10 layouts) with automated DXF export for AutoCAD.

projects.title: Liquid Organic Hydrogen Carrier (LOHC) - Final Year Project
projects.description: Lead team to design a 5000 tons green hydrogen storage/transport system using LOHC for Singapore's hydrogen infrastructure.

projects.title: AVEVA Software Simulation Competition - MTH Hydrogen Storage System
projects.description: Led team of 5 designed a 30% ROI MTH based hydrogen storage system with AVEVA simulations. Integrated PV cells to achieve 20% green / 80% blue hydrogen with carbon storage system.

projects.title: Course Allocation System
projects.description: Allocated students to assignment teams using round-robin and rule-based systems to maximize diversity.

projects.title: SC2002 Internship Placement System
projects.description: Developed TUI and GUI using Java OOP for efficient internship matching.

projects.title: Southeast Asia Heart Attack Dataset Clustering and Dimensionality Reduction
projects.description: Applied K-Means, Gaussian clustering, PCA, ICA, and random projection for data analysis and optimization.

projects.title: Semantic Image Segmentation using Attention U-Net Variants
projects.description: Implemented Attention U-Net models in PyTorch with data augmentation and pretrained encoders for semantic image segmentation.

projects.title: AIChE NTU Student Chapter Official Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive website for the American Institute of Chemical Engineers NTU Student Chapter showcasing events, member resources, and chapter activities. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for optimal performance and accessibility.

projects.title: SC1003 Battleship Game (Pygame)
projects.description: Interactive Battleship game built with Pygame featuring AI opponent, graphical interface, and strategic gameplay mechanics.

projects.title: Pandemic Simulation Game
projects.description: Epidemiological modeling and simulation system. Formulates disease spread dynamics problems using statistical analysis and simulation frameworks to understand and predict pandemic behavior.

projects.title: Covid-19 Prediction Analysis
projects.description: Built a predictive model to forecast COVID-19 trends and flag high-risk regions for travel safety.

projects.title: Robotic Maze Path Planning
projects.description: Developed path finding algorithms for autonomous robot navigation.

projects.title: URECA: Optimization of 3D SU-8 Microstructures using Mask-less Lithography
projects.description: Reduced microstructure size to 27 µm and print time by 30% via automation. Improved wafer fabrication efficiency 20%; enhanced imaging resolution 4× with SEM + oil immersion.
